title: Martin four
creator_contributor_role: Victorian College of the Arts, production company
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Gay and lesbian studies
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Homosexuality in motion pictures
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Mothers and sons
description: Caught up in the claustrophobic world of his mother, who lives in a drunken haze of romantic memories of exotic places, an aimless young gay man tries to make a connection with love and life in the present. Cast includes Susan Lyons, Todd MacDonald, Suzi Dougherty and Suzy Cato.
